text: Temirlan Erlanuly Erlanov (; born 9 July 1993) is a Kazakhstani footballer who plays as a defender for FC Tobol and the Kazakhstan national team. ==Career== ===Club=== On 5 January 2020, FC Tobol announced the signing of Erlanov on a contract until the end of 2020. ===International=== Erlanov made his debut for Kazakhstan on 21 February 2019, starting in a friendly against Moldova before being substituted off at half-time, with the match finishing as a 1–0 win. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Ordabasy |2016 |rowspan="4"|Kazakhstan Premier League |3||0||0||0||1||1||colspan="2"|-||4||1 |- |2017 |25||1||2||0||2||0||colspan="2"|-||29||1 |- |2018 |17||4||0||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||17||4 |- |2019 |25||2||2||1||4||1||colspan="2"|-||31||4 |- !colspan="2"|Total !70!!7!!4!!1!!7!!2!!-!!-!!81!!10 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !70!!7!!4!!1!!7!!2!!-!!-!!81!!10 |} ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Kazakhstan |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||7||1 |- !Total!!7!!1 |} ====International goals==== :Scores and results list Kazakhstan's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" |- ! # !!
